text:
- Braze is a comprehensive
customer engagement platform
that allows our customers to deliver
best in class customer experiences

across a number of
different messaging suites.

We're sending billions of
messages every single day.

And you can imagine, that
needs to be delivered

in real time and to
really handle that scale,
AWS has been our core partner.

We leverage a number of
different AWS products
so we're able to stream real time data
back into our partner's data warehouses
through an integration with S3.

We've got an integration
with AWS Personalized,
which is their recommendation engine

so we can kind of pull in
dynamic recommendations
at send time into messages.

One of our larger customers
in the on-demand space

is a company called Globo,
that operates worldwide

and they're able to leverage
AWS's data warehouse

to capture a number of
different custom attributes.

And those custom attributes
are then pulled into Braze
to make sure that we're leveraging
the right personalized message.

For our customers, engagement
has never been more important,
especially in today's age where you've got
so much competitive forces.

And so if they're able to
deliver these best in class

experiences that are relevant
and personalized and intimate,
it becomes really important from a
competitive advantage standpoint
and overall differentiation.
